title: BC跨BC的应用以及报错！！！（Bungeecord）
author: 我是小童鞋
txt_content:
版本1.10.2
我尝试BC跨BC发现失败
以下报错（旧版本的BC还可以用，而这里是1.9+，难道是说Bungeecord版本问题？）

14:28:53 [信息] [iO_5] <-> ServerConnector [login] has connected
14:29:12 [信息] [iO_5] <-> ServerConnector [hublobby] has connected
14:29:12 [信息] [iO_5] <-> DownstreamBridge <-> [login] has disconnected
14:29:28 [信息] [iO_5] <-> ServerConnector [arpgbc] has connected
14:29:29 [严重] [iO_5] <-> DownstreamBridge <-> [arpgbc] - encountered exception
java.lang.IllegalStateException: Cannot connect proxy to itself!
